summary: A suite of acceptance tests that verify core functionalities of the transformer‑lens library, including activation‑cache operations, evaluation utilities, token patching via hooks, encoder and transformer wrappers, multi‑GPU model deployment, and special‑token handling in tokenizers.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the library’s model loading, data handling, device management, and analytical tools work correctly in real‑world scenarios, reducing regression risk and supporting reliable deployment of transformer models.
